testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P1) Verify that user can successfully navigate to the login
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to login pop-up.........................................passed Then User make sure that the current section is the login section...........passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P2) Verify that user can login with valid phone number and password
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to login pop-up.........................................passed And user enter mobile number "01003803007" and password "Eyad123@"..........passed When user press login button................................................passed Then User is logged in and welcome message with the name appears in the top right of the screen.passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P3) Verify that user can not login with valid phone number and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to login pop-up.........................................passed And user enter mobile number "01003803007" and password "Eyad123@@".........passed When user press login button................................................passed Then error message appears about the invalid password.......................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P4) Verify that user can not login with invalid phone number and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to login pop-up.........................................passed And user enter mobile number "01003003000" and password "Eyad123@"..........passed When user press login button................................................passed Then error message appears about the invalid phone number...................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P5) Verify that user can not login with invalid phone number and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to login pop-up.........................................passed And user enter mobile number "01003003000" and password "Eyad123@@".........passed When user press login button................................................passed Then error message appears about the invalid phone number first.............passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: (P6) Verify that user can show his own password
